isb:document.p: &appName; is a chemical kinetics stochastic simulation software package written in Java. It provides a model definition environment and an implementation of the Gillespie, Gibson-Bruck, and Tau-Leap stochastic algorithms. &appName; is capable of importing and exporting the SBML model definition language, as well as displaying models graphically using the Cytoscape software system. &appName; was written by Stephen Ramsey in the laboratory of Hamid Bolouri at ISB. &appName; is based on the &localJavaLibraryName; library. The software is available for download within a self-extracting installer. It is distributed under the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL), which is a standard "free software" and "open source" license. &appName; requires the Java 2 Runtime Environment (JRE) version 1.4 or newer, or an equivalent JRE. For more information about the &appName; system, please consult the &appName; User Manual.
